gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [670-42] S2003 should be equal to S0103+S0203+S0303+S0403+S0503+S0603+S0703+S0803+S0903+S1003+S1103+S1203+S1303+S1403+S1503+S1603+S1703+S1803+S1903 with margin of error [1] {{abs([670-42a:R20C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$a}) - [670-42a:R1C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$b}) + [670-42a:R2C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$c}) + [670-42a:R3C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$d}) + [670-42a:R4C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$e}) + [670-42a:R5C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$f}) + [670-42a:R6C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$g}) + [670-42a:R7C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$h}) + [670-42a:R8C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$i}) + [670-42a:R9C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$j}) + [670-42a:R10C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$k}) + [670-42a:R11C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$l}) + [670-42a:R12C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$m}) + [670-42a:R13C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$n}) + [670-42a:R14C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$o}) + [670-42a:R15C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$p}) + [670-42a:R16C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$q}) + [670-42a:R17C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$r}) + [670-42a:R18C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$s}) + [670-42a:R19C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$t})) <= 1}}
